useCase.name: Retrieve Climate Data
useCase.description: As a Level 4 projections producer, I want to retrieve climate data from Level 2/3/4 data producers.

preconditions.precondition: The Level 4 projections producer needs aggregated time series of air temperature, gridded historical weather observations, and climate model data.

successEndConditions.condition: The Level 4 projections producer receives the required URIs from the Level 2/3/4 data producer.

useCase.trigger: Level 4 projections producer asks for climate data from Level 2/3/4 data producer.

mainSequence.step: Level 4 projections producer asks for aggregated time series of air temperature.
Level 4 projections producer asks for gridded historical weather observations.
Level 4 projections producer asks for climate model data.
Level 2/3/4 data producer gets URIs from Level 2/3/4 data.
Level 2/3/4 data producer gives back URIs to Level 4 projections producer.
